snippet: The Brooklyn Museum took the open-studios model and used it to create a contest in which the award was a spot in “GO,” the group exhibition now on view.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews Brooklyn Museum exhibition Go: a community-curated open studio project.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn Museum took the open-studios model and used it to create a contest in which the award was a spot in “GO,” the group exhibition now on view.

headline.seo: ‘Go,’ a Group Show at the Brooklyn Museum
headline.main: Crowdsourced Exhibition Looks Kind of Familiar
headline.print_headline: Crowdsourced Exhibition Looks Kind of Familiar
